entry.title: Markovian Tweets
entry.content: Generates a random tweet of 280 characters from a huge text file.

entry.title: Command Line Minesweeper
entry.content: A minesweeper game that is played on the terminal.

entry.title: Asynchronous TCP Segment Exchanger
entry.content: A networking program where the server and client exchange TCP messages of different sizes.

entry.title: Server/Client Secret Message Exchanger
entry.content: A networking application which implements both TCP and UDP to exchange secret messages between the server and client in a specified port range.

entry.title: Data Encryption in IoT using modified Public Key Infrastructure (PKI)
entry.content: Enabling security in an IoT network using select features of a PKI. The model was simulated using network simulator 3 and the security aspects were checked with wireshark.
